articles.author: Matthew Elder
articles.description: Celtic goalkeeper Joe Hart has hailed Jack Butland's transfer to Rangers as a "good move" but stopped short of wishing his friend well out of “respect” for the Old Firm rivalry.

articles.author: Joel Sked
articles.description: Scottish Premiership clubs are continuing to work towards the new league season with on-field and off-field preparation. Some sides have travelled abroad for a warm-weather training camp, while others have already played a number of friendlies with competitive games beginning on a week on Saturday with the Viaplay Cup group stages. Away from the pitch managers and sporting directors are making tweaks to the squad with a couple of clubs yet to sign anyone. As for individuals from last season, there are a number of players who are still without a club...
articles.title: 9 most interesting out of contact Premiership stars - ex-Celtic star, Rangers fan favourite, Hearts & Aberdeen winger

articles.author: Joel Sked
articles.description: It is just over a week until the start of the competitive season in Scotland with the start of the Viaplay Cup group stages.It will also be an important time for clubs to work further on their squad building ahead of the new league campaign.
articles.title: Scottish transfers: Celtic battle EPL side for striker, Rangers-linked star and £8m-rated ex-Hearts ace wanted

articles.description: REMEMBER when Chris Sutton was barred from performing his BT Sport duties at Ibrox because the club “could not guarantee his safety”? That was one, high-profile figure. A man who would have been surrounded by colleagues, in an enclosed part of the stadium, and whose profile means that any jeopardising of his safety would be glaringly obvious to any of the police and security personnel on duty. It would take a special kind of person to decide to jeopardise his safety.
